info.title: API Documentation
info.description: This is the API documentation for the site, powered by Mash Server.

post.summary: Check account deletion code and delete user
post.description: Checks the deletion code, deletes the user's account if valid, and sends a confirmation email.

email.description: Email of the user confirming account deletion

post.description: Generates a code for confirming account deletion and sends it to the user's email.

email.description: Email of the user requesting account deletion

get.summary: Logs in a user to the chat service
get.description: Logs in a user to the chat service and returns a session token

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email of the user

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password of the user

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: First name of the user

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: Last name of the user

400.description: Invalid request (e.g., missing or invalid email/password)

post.description: Logs in a user and returns a session token

400.description: Invalid request (e.g., invalid email or password)

post.summary: Logs in a user with Google
post.description: Logs in a user using Google and returns a session token
Logs in a user and returns a session token

400.description: Invalid request (e.g., invalid email or password)

get.summary: Generates a nonce for client use
get.description: Generates a nonce for client use

post.summary: Logs in a user with SIWE
post.description: Logs in a user using Sign-In With Ethereum (SIWE)

400.description: Invalid request (e.g., invalid message or signature)

post.description: Logs out the current user and clears all session tokens

401.description: Unauthorized, no user to log out

post.description: Generates an OTP secret for the user

post.summary: Verifies the OTP or recovery code for login
post.description: Verifies the OTP for login and returns a session token. If the OTP is invalid, the provided code is checked against the recovery codes.

otp.description: OTP or recovery code to verify

200.description: OTP or recovery code verified successfully, user logged in

post.description: Resends the OTP for 2FA
Saves the OTP secret and type for the user
Enables or disables OTP for the user

status.description: Status to set for OTP (enabled or disabled)

post.description: Verifies the OTP and saves it

post.summary: Registers a new user with Google
post.description: Registers a new user using Google and returns a session token
Registers a new user and returns a session token

400.description: Invalid request (e.g., email already in use)

post.summary: Initiates a password reset process for a user
post.description: Initiates a password reset process for a user and sends an email with a reset link

status.description: Indicates if the request was successful

404.description: User not found with the provided email

get.description: Retrieves all roles
Retrieves session data from Redis by sessionId

post.summary: Verifies the email with the provided token
post.description: Verifies the email with the provided token

400.description: Invalid request (e.g., missing or invalid token)

post.description: Resends email verification token to user's email address

post.summary: Verifies a password reset token and sets the new password
post.description: Verifies a password reset token and sets the new password

200.description: Password reset successfully, new password set

400.description: Invalid request (e.g., missing token or newPassword)

get.summary: Lists all authors based on status and posts
get.description: This endpoint retrieves all available authors based on their status and optionally includes their posts.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter authors by status

parameters.name: posts
parameters.description: Include posts for each author

userId.description: User ID associated with the entity

updatedAt.description: Last update date of the post

get.description: This endpoint retrieves the author profile associated with a given user id along with the posts linked to that profile.

post.description: This endpoint creates a new author.

parameters.name: restore
parameters.description: Restore the Posts instead of deleting

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Delete the Posts permanently

ids.description: Array of post IDs to delete

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter criteria for records.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of records per page. Default: 10.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Default: 1.

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: Field name to sort by.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Order of sorting: asc or desc.

parameters.name: showDeleted
parameters.description: Show deleted records. Default: false.

categoryId.description: Category ID linked to the Post

updatedAt.description: Last update date of the Post

deletedAt.description: Deletion date of the Post, if applicable

post.description: This endpoint creates a new blog post.

tags.description: Array of tag objects associated with the post

message.description: Confirmation message of successful post creation

409.description: Conflict, post with the same slug already exists

put.summary: Bulk updates the status of Posts

ids.description: Array of Post IDs to update

status.description: New status to apply to the Posts

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the post to delete

parameters.name: restore
parameters.description: Restore the post instead of deleting

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Delete the post permanently

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the blog post to retrieve

status.description: Indicates if the request was successful

put.summary: Updates a blog post identified by id
put.description: This endpoint updates an existing blog post.

parameters.description: The id of the blog post to update

status.description: New status of the blog post

tags.description: Array of tag objects associated with the post

message.description: Confirmation message of successful post update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Post to update

status.description: New status to apply to the Post

get.description: Retrieves top authors based on post counts.
This endpoint retrieves the author profile associated with a given user id along with the posts linked to that profile.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Author ID

get.description: This endpoint retrieves all categories that have at least one published post along with the count of their associated posts.

parameters.description: The ID of the comment to update

get.description: Retrieves a list of available durations for binary options.
Retrieves a list of all available binary trading markets.
Retrieves a list of orders for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of order to retrieve.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: currency of the order to retrieve.

parameters.name: pair
parameters.description: pair of the order to retrieve.

post.description: Creates a new binary order for the authenticated user.

requestBody.description: Binary order data to be created.

get.summary: List Binary Orders from Last 30 Days
get.description: Retrieves the non-pending binary orders for practice and non-practice accounts from the last 30 days and compares them with the previous month.

200.description: A list of binary orders from the last 30 days

del.description: Cancels a binary order for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the binary order to cancel.

get.description: Retrieves a specific binary order by ID for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the binary order to retrieve.

userId.description: User ID associated with the order

side.description: Side of the order (e.g., BUY, SELL)

payoutPerPoint.description: Payout per point of the order

status.description: Status of the order (e.g., OPEN, CLOSED)

isDemo.description: Whether the order is a demo

closedAt.description: Time when the order was closed

closePrice.description: Price at which the order was closed

updatedAt.description: Last update date of the order

get.description: Retrieves historical chart data for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Symbol to retrieve data for.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Interval to retrieve data for.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start timestamp to retrieve data from.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End timestamp to retrieve data from.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Duration to retrieve data for.

open.description: Opening price for the data interval

high.description: Highest price during the data interval

low.description: Lowest price during the data interval

close.description: Closing price for the data interval

volume.description: Volume of trades during the data interval

parameters.description: The currency to convert to

post.description: Initiates a 2Checkout payment process by creating a payment session. This endpoint supports hosted checkout integration for web applications.

amount.description: Payment amount in base currency unit

200.description: 2Checkout payment session created successfully. Returns checkout URL for redirect.

get.description: Retrieves the current status of a 2Checkout payment using the order reference

parameters.name: orderReference
parameters.description: 2Checkout order reference to check status for

post.description: Verifies a 2Checkout payment using the order reference and updates the transaction status accordingly
Handles Instant Payment Notifications (IPN) from 2Checkout to automatically process payment status updates

Initiates an Adyen payment process by creating a payment session using Adyen's Sessions flow. This endpoint supports web checkout with multiple payment methods including cards, digital wallets, and local payment methods.

requestBody.description: Payment information for Adyen session creation

amount.description: Payment amount in base currency units

countryCode.description: Country code for payment method localization

200.description: Adyen payment session created successfully. Returns session data for Adyen Web Drop-in integration.

sessionData.description: Adyen session data for client-side integration

get.description: Retrieves the current status of an Adyen payment by transaction reference. This endpoint provides real-time payment status information for tracking and reconciliation purposes.

schema.description: Transaction reference to check status for

updatedAt.description: Transaction last update timestamp

post.description: Manually verifies an Adyen payment by checking the payment status and updating the transaction accordingly. This endpoint is used for manual verification when automatic webhook processing is not available.

Processes Adyen webhook notifications for payment events. This endpoint handles automatic payment status updates, wallet balance updates, and transaction processing based on Adyen's notification system.

live.description: Whether this is a live notification

400.description: Invalid webhook data or signature verification failed

post.description: Creates an Authorize.Net Accept Hosted payment page for secure deposit processing. Returns a payment token for hosted payment form integration.

200.description: Hosted payment page created successfully. Returns payment token and form URL.

status.description: Indicates if the request was successful

get.description: Retrieves the current status of an Authorize.Net transaction by its reference ID.

parameters.name: referenceId
parameters.description: The transaction reference ID

status.description: Indicates if the request was successful

updatedAt.description: Transaction last update timestamp

post.description: Confirms the validity of an Authorize.Net transaction by its reference ID, ensuring the transaction is authenticated and processing the deposit.

parameters.name: referenceId
parameters.description: The transaction reference ID

200.description: Transaction verified successfully. Returns the transaction details and updated wallet balance.

status.description: Indicates if the request was successful

post.description: Processes Authorize.Net webhook notifications for payment events including authorizations, captures, refunds, and cancellations.
Initiates a dLocal payment process for emerging markets. Supports multiple payment methods including cards, bank transfers, cash payments, and digital wallets across 60+ countries.

requestBody.description: Payment information including customer details and document ID for compliance

amount.description: Payment amount in the specified currency

country.description: Two-letter country code (e.g., BR, AR, MX)

payment_method_id.description: Payment method ID (e.g., CARD, VI, MC, or specific local methods)

document_id.description: Customer document ID (required for most countries)

phone.description: Customer phone number with country code

200.description: dLocal payment created successfully. Returns payment details and redirect URL for completion.

redirect_url.description: URL to redirect customer for payment completion

get.description: Retrieve current payment status from dLocal API without updating local database

parameters.name: payment_id
parameters.description: dLocal payment ID to check

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: Internal order ID to check

post.description: Manually verify a dLocal payment status and update transaction accordingly
Handles payment notifications from dLocal with HMAC signature verification
Initiates an eWAY payment process for Asia-Pacific region. Supports multiple connection methods including Transparent Redirect, Direct Connection, and Responsive Shared Page.

amount.description: Payment amount in smallest currency unit

return_url.description: URL to redirect after successful payment

cancel_url.description: URL to redirect after cancelled payment

get.description: Retrieve current payment status from eWAY API without updating local database

parameters.name: access_code
parameters.description: eWAY access code to check

parameters.name: transaction_id
parameters.description: eWAY transaction ID to check

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Internal reference ID to check

post.description: Verify an eWAY payment status using access code and update transaction accordingly

post.summary: Performs a custom fiat deposit transaction
post.description: Initiates a custom fiat deposit transaction for the currently authenticated user

Initiates an iPay88 payment process for Southeast Asian markets. Supports multiple payment methods including credit cards, e-wallets, and online banking across Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Philippines, Indonesia, and Vietnam.

requestBody.description: Payment information for iPay88 payment creation

amount.description: Payment amount in base currency units

currency.description: Currency code (e.g., MYR, SGD, THB, PHP, IDR, VND, USD, EUR, GBP, AUD)

paymentMethod.description: iPay88 payment method code (optional, defaults to show all available methods)

lang.description: Payment page language (ISO-2 format: EN, CN, MY, TH, ID, VN)

404.description: Payment gateway not found not found

get.description: Queries iPay88 for the current status of a payment transaction using the reference number. This endpoint can be used to check payment status when webhook notifications are not received.

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Transaction reference number

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Transaction amount

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Transaction currency

post.description: Handles iPay88 payment verification from return URL. This endpoint processes the payment response from iPay88 and updates the transaction status accordingly.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid signature or parameters

post.description: Processes iPay88 backend notifications for payment events. This endpoint handles automatic payment status updates, wallet balance updates, and transaction processing based on iPay88's notification system.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid signature or parameters

post.summary: Creates a Stripe payment intent or checkout session
post.description: Initiates a Stripe payment process by creating either a payment intent or a checkout session, based on the request parameters. This endpoint supports different workflows for web and Flutter applications.

amount.description: Payment amount in smallest currency unit (e.g., cents)

intent.description: Flag indicating if the request is from a mobile app

200.description: Payment intent or checkout session created successfully. The response structure varies based on the request context: for Flutter applications, `id` and `clientSecret` are returned; for web applications, `version`, `id`, and `url` are provided.

post.description: Confirms the validity of a Stripe checkout session by its session ID, ensuring the session is authenticated and retrieving associated payment intent and line items details.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: Stripe checkout session ID

200.description: Checkout session verified successfully. Returns the session ID, payment intent status, and detailed line items.

lineItems.description: List of line items associated with the checkout session

post.description: Confirms a completed Stripe payment intent and creates the corresponding wallet transaction

parameters.name: intentId
parameters.description: Stripe payment intent ID (pi_xxxxx)

post.description: Confirms the validity of a Stripe checkout session by its session ID, ensuring the session is authenticated and retrieving associated payment intent and line items details.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: Stripe checkout session ID

200.description: Checkout session verified successfully. Returns the session ID, payment intent status, and detailed line items.

lineItems.description: List of line items associated with the checkout session

post.description: This endpoint initiates a spot deposit transaction for the user

get.description: Fetches a comprehensive list of all investments made by users, including details of the investment plan and user information.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter criteria for records.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of records per page. Default: 10.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Default: 1.

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: Field name to sort by.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Order of sorting: asc or desc.

parameters.name: showDeleted
parameters.description: Show deleted records. Default: false.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of investment to retrieve

roi.description: Return on investment (ROI) of the investment

duration.description: Duration of the investment in days

minAmount.description: Minimum amount required for the investment plan

maxAmount.description: Maximum amount allowed for the investment plan

roi.description: Return on investment (ROI) of the investment plan

duration.description: Duration of the investment plan in days

post.description: Initiates a new investment based on the specified plan and amount. This process involves updating the user's wallet balance and creating transaction records.

requestBody.description: Data required to create a new investment

planId.description: The unique identifier of the investment plan

durationId.description: The unique identifier of the investment duration

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available investment plans that are currently active and open for new investments.

minAmount.description: Minimum amount required for the investment plan

maxAmount.description: Maximum amount allowed for the investment plan

roi.description: Return on investment (ROI) of the investment plan

duration.description: Duration of the investment plan in days

get.summary: Retrieves a single investment plan by ID
get.description: Fetches detailed information about a specific investment plan based on its unique identifier.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the investment plan to retrieve

minAmount.description: Minimum amount required for the investment plan

maxAmount.description: Maximum amount allowed for the investment plan

roi.description: Return on investment (ROI) of the investment plan

duration.description: Duration of the investment plan in days

get.description: Retrieves platform-wide investment stats: number of active investors, total invested amount, average return (completed investments), and number of investment plans.

averageReturn.description: Average return percentage for completed investments.

totalPlans.description: Total number of active investment plans.

maxProfitPercentage.description: Maximum profit percentage among all active plans.

get.summary: Retrieves investments for the logged-in user
get.description: Fetches all active investments associated with the currently authenticated user, including details about the investment plan and user information.

roi.description: Return on investment (ROI) of the investment

duration.description: Duration of the investment in days

minAmount.description: Minimum amount required for the investment plan

maxAmount.description: Maximum amount allowed for the investment plan

roi.description: Return on investment (ROI) of the investment plan

duration.description: Duration of the investment plan in days

del.description: Allows a user to cancel an existing investment by its UUID. The operation reverses any financial transactions associated with the investment and updates the users wallet balance accordingly.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the investment to cancel

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of investment to retrieve

get.summary: Retrieves a single investment by UUID

parameters.name: type

roi.description: Return on investment (ROI) of the investment

duration.description: Duration of the investment in days

maxAmount.description: Maximum amount allowed for the investment plan

roi.description: Return on investment (ROI) of the investment plan

duration.description: Duration of the investment plan in days

get.description: Retrieves all API keys associated with the authenticated user.

post.description: Generates a new API key for the authenticated user.

requestBody.description: Data required to create a new API key

permissions.description: Permissions associated with the API key

ipWhitelist.description: IP addresses whitelisted for the API key

ipRestriction.description: Restrict access to specific IPs (true) or allow unrestricted access (false)

del.description: Deletes an API key by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the API key to delete

put.description: Updates an API key's details such as permissions, IP whitelist, or IP restriction.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the API key to update

requestBody.description: Data for updating the API key

permissions.description: Updated permissions associated with the API key

ipWhitelist.description: Updated IP whitelist for the API key

ipRestriction.description: Updated IP restriction setting (true for restricted, false for unrestricted)

get.summary: Retrieves all KYC applications for the logged-in user
get.description: Fetches all Know Your Customer (KYC) applications for the currently authenticated user. This endpoint requires user authentication and returns an array with the users KYC application information, including the verification status and other details.

userId.description: User ID associated with the KYC record

templateId.description: ID of the KYC template used

data.description: KYC data as a JSON object

status.description: Current status of the KYC verification

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the KYC record was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the KYC record was last updated

post.description: Submits a new KYC application for the authenticated user. Expects a JSON payload with a valid levelId and a 'fields' object containing key/value pairs for each field as defined in the KYC level configuration.

levelId.description: ID of the KYC level for this application

fields.description: An object where keys are field IDs and values are the submitted data

get.summary: Retrieves a KYC application for the logged-in user
get.description: Fetches a specific Know Your Customer (KYC) application, identified by ID, for the currently authenticated user. This endpoint requires user authentication and returns the KYC application details, including the verification status and other information.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the KYC record to retrieve

userId.description: User ID associated with the KYC record

templateId.description: ID of the KYC template used

data.description: KYC data as a JSON object

status.description: Current status of the KYC verification

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the KYC record was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the KYC record was last updated

put.description: Updates an existing KYC application for the authenticated user. Expects a JSON payload with a 'fields' object containing key/value pairs for each field as defined in the KYC level configuration. The application to update is identified by the 'id' parameter in the path. The level is derived from the existing application record.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the KYC application to update

fields.description: An object where keys are field IDs and values are the submitted data

get.description: Fetches all currently active KYC (Know Your Customer) levels that are used for KYC processes. This endpoint is accessible without authentication and returns an array of levels that are marked as active in the system.

get.summary: Fetch a specific active KYC level by ID
get.description: Fetches an active KYC (Know Your Customer) level by its ID. This endpoint requires authentication.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the KYC level to retrieve

del.description: Deletes all notifications for the authenticated creator.

get.description: Retrieves notifications for the authenticated creator along with aggregated statistics.

post.description: Marks all notifications as read for the authenticated creator.

del.description: Deletes the specified notification for the authenticated creator.

parameters.description: Notification ID

post.description: Marks the specified notification as unread for the authenticated creator.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Notification ID

get.summary: Lists all tickets for the logged-in user
get.description: Fetches all support tickets associated with the currently authenticated user.

parameters.description: Filter criteria for records.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of records per page. Default: 10.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Default: 1.

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: Field name to sort by.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Order of sorting: asc or desc.

parameters.description: Show deleted records. Default: false.

userId.description: ID of the user who created the ticket

agentId.description: ID of the agent assigned to the ticket

parameters.description: The UUID of the ticket to close
